featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: HI.  My name is Sam.  I am the manager here at Carolina Adult Source.  I am so sorry for that particular experience you had with that particular clerk.  I am personally going to make sure that this does not happen again.  Now as far as the merchandise goes, we get new merchandise in every week.  We recently expanded several sections in the store by adding merchandise directly to the sections.  The floor plan and wall sections in certain parts of the store were completely reorganized to accommodate this.  If there is ever anything that you are looking for and we do not carry it, let one of the employees know.  A deposit may be involved depending on how expensive the item is.  Again, I am sorry for your experience with this clerk.  Pleas do not let it discourage from coming back in.  It will not happen again .
featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Bu yerin nasil acik kaldigini bilmiyorum. Neredeyse hic yeni urun yok. Dun gece gittim ve tezgahin arkasinda siyahi bir kadin var. Telefonda ve beni karsilama zahmetine girmiyor.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: MERHABA. Benim adim Sam. Burada, Carolina Adult Source'ta yoneticiyim. O katiple yasadigin ozel deneyim icin cok uzgunum. Sahsen bunun bir daha olmamasini saglayacagim. Simdi, mallar soz konusu oldugunda, her hafta yeni mallar aliyoruz. Kisa bir sure once, dogrudan bolumlere urunler ekleyerek magazadaki birkac bolumu genislettik. Magazanin belirli bolumlerindeki kat plani ve duvar bolumleri tamamen buna uygun olarak yeniden duzenlenmistir. Aradiginiz bir sey varsa ve biz tasimiyorsak, calisanlardan birine bildirin. Ogenin ne kadar pahali olduguna bagli olarak bir depozito soz konusu olabilir. Bu katiple yasadiginiz deneyim icin tekrar uzgunum. Lutfen geri gelmekten caydirmasina izin vermeyin. Bir daha olmayacak.

Yetiskinlere yonelik urunler icin alisveris yapmak bazilari icin zor olabilir, bu nedenle deneyiminiz hakkinda iyi hissetmenizi saglamak bizim icin onemlidir.

Our employees are very well educated and are eager to help any customer that walks through the door. We would much rather spend time answering questions and giving great customer service than sending someone home with a product they dislike.
Unfortunately not all personalities mesh but thankfully there are other stores that may better suit your needs.

Calisanlarimiz cok iyi egitimlidir ve kapidan giren her musteriye yardim etmeye isteklidirler. Birisini sevmedigi bir urunle evine gondermek yerine, sorulari yanitlamaya ve mukemmel musteri hizmetleri sunmaya zaman ayirmayi tercih ederiz.

featured_reviews.review_id:
So....we were going to come here but the lady that popped her head out the door was SUPER rude. We parked in front of their store and walked toward the nail salon next door to see how long the wait would be. We were going to walk back over to Adam & Eve to come inside because we knew we were going to have to wait on a nail appointment.

The lady inside popped her head out the door and with an extremely rude tone told us we had to move our car. My friend told her we were coming back over there after we got an appt. Her response was "ok if you get an appt you need to move your car." CLEARLY WE KNEW THAT.

Very nasty lady. Horrible attitude. The store already has bad reviews and someone else left almost the exact same review.

You just lost business. Won't ever come here again. Wish I could leave 0 stars.

Now I'm seeing other reviews here saying she is very rude to people of color. So now it makes sense!

buraya gelecektik ama kapidan kafasini cikaran kadin SUPER kaba davrandi. Beklemenin ne kadar surecegini gormek icin magazalarinin onune park ettik ve yandaki manikur salonuna dogru yuruduk. Iceri girmek icin Adam & Eve'e geri donecektik cunku tirnak randevusu icin beklememiz gerektigini biliyorduk.

Icerideki bayan kafasini kapidan disari cikardi ve son derece kaba bir ses tonuyla arabamizi cekmemiz gerektigini soyledi. Arkadasim basvuru aldiktan sonra oraya geri donecegimizi soyledi. Yaniti "tamam, eger bir basvuru alirsaniz arabanizi hareket ettirmeniz gerekir." ACIKCA BIZ BUNU BILIYORUZ.

Cok igrenc bir bayan. Korkunc bir tutum. Magazada zaten kotu yorumlar var ve bir baskasi da neredeyse ayni incelemeyi yapti.

Az once isini kaybettin. Bir daha asla buraya gelmeyecegim. Keske 0 yildiz birakabilseydim.

Simdi burada onun beyaz olmayan insanlara karsi cok kaba davrandigini soyleyen baska yorumlar goruyorum. Artik mantikli geliyor!

featured_reviews.review_id:
It's good to have this kind of store in the community and I am happy about that, But I am sorry to say that it's very sad and disappointing at all to have such kind of an employee in your store. I went to look and to buy an item. There was a young man with a thick eye glasses who was really rude, full of hate ( I can read from his face easily ) and unhelpful at all. He can't even talk and try to solve the issues easily at all. For each questions He keep saying ' I don't know'.
If he doesn't know how to solve, communicate , handle and taking care of the customers nicely why does the owner doesn't give the chance for other people who can fit and address the customer needs? As a professional guy I tried to be nice at all with a good attitude inside your store.
As long as he is representing the business store , give customers the respect they deserve and show that in your language. For example, never fight back or hurt the customer, even if they sound irrational( But I wasn't at all ) ; and never say "I don't know" to their request, but offer to go the extra mile and see what's possible.
The owner or the manager should see that as a serious concern. It's easy for me to buy from Amazon  If you have this kind of unwelcome and unhelpful employee inside the store.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Toplumda bu tur bir magazanin olmasi guzel ve bundan mutluyum. Ancak magazanizda boyle bir calisanin olmasinin cok uzucu ve hayal kirikligi yarattigini soylemekten uzuntu duyuyorum. Bir esya almaya ve bakmaya gittim. Kalin gozluklu, gercekten kaba, nefret dolu (yuzunden rahatlikla okuyabiliyorum) ve hicbir ise yaramayan genc bir adam vardi. Hic konusamiyor ve sorunlari kolayca cozmeye calismiyor. Her soruya 'Bilmiyorum' diyor.
Eger musterileriyle nasil guzelce cozecegini, iletisim kuracagini, idare edecegini ve onlarla ilgilenecegini bilmiyorsa, isletme sahibi neden musterinin ihtiyaclarini karsilayabilecek ve karsilayabilecek diger insanlara sans vermiyor? Profesyonel bir adam olarak magazanizda iyi bir tavirla iyi bir tavir sergilemeye calistim.
Isletme magazasini temsil ettigi surece musterilere hak ettikleri saygiyi gosterin ve bunu kendi dilinizde gosterin. Ornegin, mantiksiz gorunse bile asla karsi cikmayin veya musteriye zarar vermeyin (Ama ben hic de oyle degildim); ve onlarin istegine asla "bilmiyorum" demeyin, bunun yerine daha fazla caba harcamayi ve neyin mumkun oldugunu gormeyi teklif edin.
Sahibi veya yoneticisi bunu ciddi bir endise olarak gormelidir. Magazanizda bu tur istenmeyen ve yardimci olmayan bir calisaniniz varsa Amazon'dan satin almak benim icin kolaydir.

featured_reviews.review_id: Do NOT go here!!! They ROBBED ME $70! I came here 10/04/21, in the evening, to shop for some lingerie. Because of COVID, the fitting rooms were closed. I was hesitant to buy anything without trying it on first, but I was assured I could return the items within 30 days as long as I have the original receipt (A lady with very short hair told me this). So I bought 2 similar pieces, knowing I'd likely only keep the one that fit/looks best on me. I tried them on that night when I got home and knew immediately which one I would return. I almost returned it 10/06/21, but I had a conflict and a busy week in general. I was thankful to have 30 days to return it. Just 6 days after my purchase, on 10/10/21, I had time to return it. It was a different lady helping me, and she had to call the manager to walk her through how to do a return. Well apparently, they have a 3 day policy, not 30 days, even though I was assured "30 days" multiple times from the original staff member. I was furious as I came so close to returning it just 2 days later. Heck, I could have returned it the same night if I knew their true return policy. I WAS LIED TO! I wish I got the "30 days" lie in writing or on video. The manager never offers to talk to me on the phone. They hang up, so I ask the lady to call the manager back and ask if I could perhaps get store credit instead of money back. (I was lied to after all!) She calls the manager back and then relays to me that I could only get store credit if I returned it within 3 days because ... get this ... THEY DON'T DO MONEY BACK! So not only did the original lady lie about 30 days, but she also lied about me getting my money back. UNBELIEVABLE. These employees are either LYING or NOT TRAINED to the store's actual return policies. I WILL NEVER GO BACK! This store doesn't deserve your business.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text: buraya gitmeyin!!! BENI 70 DOLAR SOYDULAR! 10/04/21 aksami buraya ic camasiri almaya geldim. COVID nedeniyle soyunma odalari kapatildi. Ilk denemeden bir sey almakta tereddut ettim, ancak orijinal faturam oldugu surece urunleri 30 gun icinde iade edebilecegimden emin oldum (bunu bana cok kisa sacli bir bayan soyledi). Bu yuzden, sadece bana en cok uyani/gorunuseni saklayacagimi bildigim icin benzer 2 parca satin aldim. Onlari o gece eve geldigimde denedim ve hangisini iade edecegimi hemen anladim. 21.06.10'da neredeyse iade edecektim ama genel olarak bir catisma ve yogun bir hafta gecirdim. Iade etmek icin 30 gunum oldugu icin sukrettim. Satin almamdan sadece 6 gun sonra, 10/10/21 tarihinde iade etmek icin zamanim oldu. Bana yardim eden farkli bir bayandi ve nasil iade yapilacagi konusunda ona yol gostermesi icin muduru aramak zorunda kaldi. Gorunuse gore, orijinal personelden defalarca "30 gun" garantisi almama ragmen, 30 gun degil, 3 gunluk bir politikalari var. Sadece 2 gun sonra iade etmeye bu kadar yaklastigim icin ofkeliydim. Kahretsin, gercek iade politikalarini bilseydim ayni gece iade edebilirdim. BANA YALAN VERILDI! Keske "30 gun" yalanini yazili ya da videolu olarak alsaydim. Mudur asla benimle telefonda konusmayi teklif etmez. Kapatiyorlar, bu yuzden bayandan muduru geri aramasini ve para iadesi yerine magaza kredisi alip alamayacagimi sormasini istiyorum. (Sonucta bana yalan soylendi!) Muduru geri aradi ve sonra bana magaza kredisini ancak 3 gun icinde iade edersem alabilecegimi soyledi cunku ... bunu anla ... PARA GERI DONUYORLAR! Yani asil bayan sadece 30 gun kadar yalan soylemedi, ayni zamanda parami geri almam konusunda da yalan soyledi. INANILMAZ. Bu calisanlar, magazanin gercek iade politikalarina gore ya YALAN SOYLUYOR ya da EGITIMLI DEGIL. ASLA GERI DONMEYECEGIM! Bu magaza isinizi hak etmiyor.

featured_reviews.review_id:
My wife bought some intimate apparel, that was a clearance item, but was told she could return it if it did not work out. She had 7 days to come back to get a store credit. She returned the item within 7 days only to be told because it was a clearance item, it could not be returned. There is nothing on the receipt or displayed in the store that says you cannot get a credit for clearance item. All the staff pointed out was a sign that says 'select' items cannot be returned. This is a very misleading and unfair policy; I could understand no 'toys' being returned, but the item was too big and she was going to exchange it for something smaller. Please make your policy clear vs. left up to interpretation.

Update 03/15/22: Additionally, although I appreciate the attempt to respond, when my wife asked where the signs were posted your employees did not point out anything you mentioned; which is a failure in training or just you trying to save face.

Lesson learned for us, check the reviews first!

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Esim bir miktar ozel kiyafet satin aldi, bu bir indirim urunuydu, ancak ise yaramazsa iade edebilecegi soylendi. Magaza kredisi almak icin geri gelmesi icin 7 gunu vardi. Urunu 7 gun icerisinde iade etti ancak bunun indirimli urun oldugu icin iade edilemedigi soylendi. Makbuzda veya magazada goruntulenen, indirimli urun icin kredi alamayacaginizi belirten hicbir sey yok. Tum personelin isaret ettigi, 'sec' ogelerin iade edilemeyecegini belirten bir isaretti. Bu cok yaniltici ve adaletsiz bir politikadir; Hicbir 'oyuncak'in iade edilmemesini anlayabiliyordum, ancak urun cok buyuktu ve onu daha kucuk bir seyle degistirecekti. Lutfen politikanizi acik bir sekilde belirtin veya yoruma birakin.

Guncelleme 03/15/22: Ek olarak, yanit verme girisiminizi takdir etsem de esim tabelalarin nereye asildigini sordugunda calisanlariniz bahsettiginiz hicbir seye isaret etmedi; bu antrenmanda bir basarisizliktir ya da sadece itibarinizi kurtarmaya calisiyorsunuzdur.

Bizim icin ogrenilen ders, once degerlendirmeleri kontrol edin!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Calisanlarimizin musterilere bu konudan bahsetmelerini saglayabilmemiz icin bu konuyu dikkatimize sundugunuz icin tesekkur ederiz. Ancak kasanin yanindaki kasada ve makbuzlarimizin alt kisminda indirimli urunlerin iade edilemeyecegine dair bir tabela bulunmaktadir. Rahatsizliginiz icin ozur dileriz.
